and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Tell <S%H1696><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> not to come <S%H935><s%> at all times <S%H6256><s%> into the Most Holy <S%H6944><s%> Place within <S%H1004><s%> the veil, <S%H6532><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> which is on the ark; <S%H727><s%> lest he die: <S%H4191><s%> for I will appear <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%> on the mercy seat. <S%H3727><s%>

"Herewith <S%H2063><s%> shall Aaron <S%H175><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%> with a young <S%H1121><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for a burnt offering. <S%H2403><s%>
